summary: In short: Adds a new spell called Quick Escape
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod that intruduces new spell!
[b][i][u]WHAT DOES THE SPELL DO?
[/u][/i][/b]The spell muffles the player, makes him invisible, and heals him!
[b][i][u]WHERE TO FIND THE SPELL TOME?
[/u][/i][/b]The spell tome can be found on most spell merchants, but Farengar has 1 copy, which he will sell to you from level 1
[b][i][u]THE SPELL IS TOO OVERPOWERED!
[/u][/i][/b]Well, it isn't, because it's considered a power, so you can only use it once a day!
[b][i][u]INSTALLATION!
[/u][/i][/b]To install, simply extract the folder in you Data folder
[b][i][u]A FAVOUR TO ASK!
[/u][/i][/b]I wanted to uplaod a few images, but i keep getting an error, so I WULD like for you to upload screenshots of the spell's effects!
author: Raptor
